## R Install packages

[Ref](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gc2zh9pBNKs)actor by \@Bragatte 202104021104

Source: R (CRAN)

```{r}
install.packages('plotly')
```

Source: R (GitHub)

```{r}
devtools::install_github("ropensci/plotly")
```

Source: R (Bioconductor)

```{r}
BiocManager::install("drawProteins")
```

---

## Python Install packages

Source: Python (pip)

```{py}
pip install scikit-learn
```

Source: Python (conda)

```{py}
conda install scikit-learn
```

## Multiple packs call
```{r}
packs = c("plotly", "ggplot2")
lapply(packs, install.packages, character.only = TRUE)
lapply(packs, require, character.only = TRUE)
```
